TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a GPE national who was born in DATE . He was represented before the Court by PERSON , a lawyer from the ORG centre in GPE . On DATE , the ORG was informed of the applicant ’s death . His son , Mr PERSON , expressed the wish to pursue the application . He is represented by PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE , the applicant bought a plot of land situated in ORG ( GPE ) . The purchase was registered in ORG ( Conservatória do PERSON ) of ORG . The previous owner of the land had applied to ORG ( ORG ) seeking permission for the land ( including the plot of the applicant as well as other plots ) to be developed for urban construction . ORG granted a construction permit ( alvará ) on DATE .

On DATE , the Public Attorney instituted proceedings against ORG in ORG Tribunal Administrativo de círculo ) of GPE . He submitted that the decision passed by ORG granting the permit was void , as some administrative procedures had not been followed . The Public Attorney asserted that when the permit was granted , ORG had not drawn up a formal plan for the urbanisation of the area . In those circumstances , the previous approval of ORG ( ORG ) was necessary pursuing to LAW no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE . As such approval had not taken place , the permit was null and void . Finally , the Public Attorney asked the ORG to serve summonses on the individuals having bought land on the area in question as private defendants .

The applicant filed his defence on DATE . He submitted that he had purchased the property in good faith and that he was unaware of any alleged failures in the issue of the permit . In his view , even if ORG annulled the permit , that could not affect his rights .
On DATE , the judge suspended the proceedings in view of the death of CARDINAL of the private defendants .
By a decision of DATE , the judge considered that the proceedings could be resumed .
On DATE , ORG gave its judgment in favour of the Public Attorney and declared the construction permit granted by ORG to be null and void . The applicant was notified of this decision on DATE .
On DATE , the applicant filed an appeal against this judgment with ORG .
On DATE , ORG rejected the appeal .
